title: MEMOIRS SCRIPT aka REMEMBER ME SCRIPT starring Robert Pattinson
description:
Original script draft by Will Fetters that circled Hollywood as one of the "best scripts" not yet made into a movie. Picked up by Summit, then went through a re-write and came out as "Remember Me" starring Robert Pattinson, Emilie de Ravin, and Pierce Brosnan.

THIS IS THE ORIGINAL MEMOIRS SCRIPT, not the re-write that is now being produced as REMEMBER ME. There will be differences!
